meanings.definition: To remove unwanted magnetism from (a television or computer monitor) by exposing it to a magnetic field that is gradually reduced to zero.
meanings.sent1: I degaussing my old TV to fix the color distortion.
meanings.sent2: Remember to degaussing the monitor regularly to maintain its performance.
meanings.sent3: After degaussing the screen, the colors looked like a rainbow!
meanings.sent4: Degaussing the monitor is like hitting the reset button for the colors.
meanings.sent5: The process of degaussing made the screen clear and bright again.

meanings.definition: The process of degaussing a device to remove unwanted magnetism.
meanings.sent1: The degaussing of the hard drive was necessary to protect the data.
meanings.sent2: A professional technician performed the degaussing on the equipment.
meanings.sent3: The degaussing of the device seemed like a magical spell to remove magnetism.
meanings.sent4: In the world of electronics, degaussing is like a superhero power against magnetism.
meanings.sent5: The degaussing process was quick and effective in eliminating unwanted magnetism.
